code: import{CLEAR_ERRORS,GET_ERRORS}from'../actions/types';var initialState={};export default function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case GET_ERRORS:return action.payload;case CLEAR_ERRORS:return{};default:return state;}}
